<empty>

You're more than tough enough
already!

Fight another monster and you're sure
to have an elevating experience!
Select an adventure log.
On whom?

*: Wayward sheep of the great shepherdess, welcome to this house of the Goddess.
How may we help you?

*: Welcome to this house of the Goddess.
How may I assist you at such a late hour?

*: May the Goddess be with you.
I hope to see you in our church again soon.
*: Please declare both your sins and high achievements before the great and benevolent Goddess.
*: Would you allow me to record your works in an adventure log?
*: Which adventure log do you wish me to save to?
*: You would prefer not to make a record of your adventure? Then so be it. You are free to do as you please.
*: Is there anything else I can help you with?

*: In that case, I must overwrite
‘<val_0>: <Cap><string_0> <val_2>:<val_3>’.
Do you wish me to proceed, o faithful one?

Now saving adventure log...
Please do not turn off the system or remove the SD card / Game Card.

*: I successfully recorded your adventure log.
Do you plan to continue on your adventure at this point?

*: May the Goddess be with you.
I hope to see you in our church again soon.

*: Oh woe is me! Alas, unhappy day!
It appears my attempt at recording the adventure log failed!
*: You would prefer not to make a record of your adventure? Then so be it. You are free to do as you please.
*: Do you plan on continuing your adventure at this point?

*: May the Goddess be with you.
I hope to see you in our church again soon.
*: You intend to rest from your adventures without recording your deeds in an adventure log?
*: This will mean you will restart your adventure from the point of your last confession. Are you sure this is what you want?
*: O great shepherdess, please allow this poor lamb to rest in peace for a while!
*: The Goddess gives me insight...

*: Faithful servant <string_0>.
The almighty one declares you need <val_4> experience point<IF_SING val_4><ELSE_NOT_SING>s<ENDIF_SING> to reach the next level.

*: The Goddess smiles upon you, <string_0>!
You appear to be as strong as you can possibly be!
*: Is there anything else I can help you with?
*: Whom shall we ask the Goddess to return to the world of the living?
*: Whom shall I treat for poison?
*: From whom do you wish to lift a curse?

*: I see. As you wish.
May the Goddess smile upon thee.
*: Is there anything else I can help you with?

*: You must be mistaken.
<Cap><string_0> seems rather too lively to be dead!
*: But <string_0> does not seem to be poisoned!

*: You must be mistaken, my lost sheep.
<Cap><string_0> does not seem to be cursed.
*: If I may... In order to perform this task, I shall require a small contribution of <val_5> gold coins. Can you oblige me?
*: I'm afraid I seem to have asked for more than you can part with.

*: O Goddess of light!
Our great and benevolent shepherdess!
*: O great and benevolent Goddess, lend us your awesome power! Please purge the poison from your faithful servant, <string_0>!

*: O omnipotent Goddess, reveal your heavenly might!
Remove the unholy curse that torments poor <string_0>!
*: If it is your will, please bring your faithful servant, <string_0>, back to this world!
<Cap><string_0> was resurrected!
*: Is there anything else I can help you with?

*: I will not linger over the matter.
Just remember, the Goddess smiles upon those who give of themselves.
*: Is there anything else I can help you with?

*: May the Goddess be with you.
I hope to see you in our church again soon.
*: It appears <string_0> has had an elevating experience!
*: I have no doubt you will enjoy the benefits of that experience after your next battle.
*: Forgive me, O Goddess, for asking too much of these poor lost sheep!
*: My prayers have been answered! You have joined us again, <string_0>! May the great shepherdess continue to watch over you!
*: If you ever feel lost after a long rest, you might want to speak to your fellow party members for advice.

*: O Goddess, our great and benevolent shepherdess!
Please protect this poor lost sheep!
*: Faithful servant of the Goddess, how may our church assist you?
*: What brings you to our church in the dead of night, child?
*: Please take care, my child, and may the Goddess watch over thee!
*: Confess all that you have done before the almighty Goddess, child.
*: And would you permit me to record your works in an adventure log?
*: Which adventure log do you wish me to save to?

*: You would prefer not to record your adventure?
Well, that is your decision, my child.
*: Is there any other way we can be of assistance?

*: In that case, I must overwrite
‘<val_0>: <Cap><string_0> <val_2>:<val_3>’.
Do you wish me to proceed, my child?

Now saving adventure log...

It appears that my attempt to record the adventure log has failed!

Well, that is your decision, my child.

You require <val_4> experience points to reach the next level.

You appear to be strong enough as you are!

Very well. The choice is yours.
May the Goddess smile upon thee.

<Cap><string_0> looks very much alive to me!

I beg of thee, watch over and protect this wandering child!

*: Thith church belongth to the Goddeth...
And to ME! Whaddya want?

*: Do you have any idea what time it ith!?
What bringth you to my church at thith
inthane hour of the night?

*: May the Goddeth watch over you!
Now thcram! G'wan! Beat it!

*: Fine, fine.
Confeth thy deedth before the great Imp... Eep!
I mean, benevolent Goddeth!
*: I'm going to record your deedth in an adventure log. Okay?

Tho be it!

*: Anything elth?
Ith that it?

*: I'll have to overwrite
‘<val_0>: <Cap><string_0> <val_2>:<val_3>’.
Shall I protheed?

*: I recorded your adventure log.
Do you thtill wanna continue adventuring now?
Do ya?

*: May the Goddeth watch over you!
Now thcram! G'wan! Beat it!
*: Uh-oh! The attempt to record your adventure log failed!

*: Tho you chooth not to record your adventurth?
Tho be it!

*: Do you thtill wanna continue adventuring?
Do ya?

*: May the Goddeth watch over you!
Now thcram! G'wan! Beat it!

*: What!? Are you therious!?
You're going to retht without recording an adventure log?
*: But thith meanth you mutht restart your adventure from the moment of your latht confession. Are you thertain? Are ya?

*: Tho be it!
Go on, then! Retht!
Thee if I care!

*: Yeth! Yeth! I'm feeling it...
Here we go!

*: Lithen up, <string_0>.
You need <val_4> experience pointh to reach the next level.

*: You know what, <string_0>?
You're thtrong enough!

*: Anything elth?
Ith that it?
*: Who do you want to return to the world of the living, now?
*: Who needth the poithon removed?
*: Okay, tho who'th curthed, then?

*: Ath you wish.
It'th up to you.

*: Anything elth?
Ith that it?

*: What'th wrong with you?
<Cap><string_0> ith very much alive!
Don't waste my time!

*: Are you out of your mind?
<Cap><string_0> ith not poithoned!

*: Are you out of your mind?
<Cap><string_0> ithn't curthed!
*: You're in my church now, tho cough up <val_5> gold cointh in appreciation!
*: Huh!? You don't have enough!
*: Okay, watch thith. Ahem.

*: Okay, then. Hey! Poithon!
Yeah, I'm talking to you!
Get out of <string_0>'th body! NOW!

*: Okay, then. Hey! Curth!
Yeah, I'm talking to you!
Get out of <string_0>'th body! NOW!
*: O <string_0>, who kicked the bucket tho stupidly! C'mon back, ya big thithy! I beg of thee!
<Cap><string_0> was resurrected!

*: Anything elth?
Ith that it?

*: Huh? Excuthe me? You won't pay?
What are you, thome kind of cheapthkate?
Thith is a church, for Goddeth'th thake!

*: Anything elth?
Ith that it?

*: May the Goddeth watch over you!
Now thcram! G'wan! Beat it!
*: Well, well! It theemth <string_0> hath had quite an elevating experience!
*: Try another battle and I thuthpect you'll enjoy the fruits of that experienth!

*: Get outta here until you do!
I'm not running a charity here!
Go on! Shoo!
*: I thee you're back, <string_0>!
*: If you ever forget which way to go cos you've been lazy and taken too long a break, thpeak to your party memberth for advice.

*: You lot thertainly are a handfull!
C'mon, pull yourthelvth together!
Now shoo!
